metadata.author: Prismatica Labs
metadata.notes: Value Channel Matrix product - value engineering tool

athenaPrompt: What if you could engineer value so strong they never leave?

body.fallback:
Value is the cast iron that forms between what's given and what's received. That's what makes deals strong. That's what scales.

This maps every channel in the exchange. Tangible and intangible forces. Customer psychology from Maslow to Jung. What particles actually move people. Makes sure whoever takes the hardest step forward gets more than they put in. 10% more? Good. 30% more? They'll never leave you.

Offering architecture they can't refuse. Overdelivery by design. This isn't marketing tactics. This is value engineering.

footer.primaryText: Make them need you, not want you.

share.subject: Worth looking at: Value Channel Matrix
share.body:
Hey,

I came across this and thought it might help with [ADD_YOUR_CHALLENGE_HERE].

This tool engineers value exchanges so strong your customers never leave. It maps every tangible and intangible channel in the relationship—from Maslow to Jung—to design offerings where people get 30% more than they put in. That's when price becomes irrelevant.

Check it out: {url}

Worth a look?
